0.text: Bug 113047  No chidren node listing when change data source for a data set in data set editor page of the query tab..

1.text: description: No chidren node listing when change data source for a data set in data set  editor page of the query tab.

2.text: steps to reproduce: 1. new a data set without SQL statement 2. in data set editor data source page.

3.text: change data source  3. the new data source has no database/table /column information   actual result: No chidren node listing when change data source for a data set in data set  editor page of the query tab.

4.text: Close the data set editor and reopen it.

6.text: expected result: when change data source, new data source children list out
